item.text: Now receive the one who is weak in the faith, and do not have disputes over differing opinions.

<st data-num="3739">One person</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believes</st> in <st data-num="2068" class="">eating</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="770" class="">weak</st> person <st data-num="2068" class="">eats</st> only <st data-num="3001" class="">vegetables</st>.

The one who <st data-num="2068" class="">eats</st> everything must <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1848" class="">despise</st> the one who <st data-num="2068" class="">does</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> the one who <st data-num="3361 2068">abstains</st> must <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st> the one who <st data-num="2068" class="">eats</st> everything, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="4355" class="">accepted</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
Who are you to pass judgment on another’s servant? Before his own master he stands or falls. And he will stand, for the Lord is able to make him stand.
One person regards one day holier than other days, and another regards them all alike. Each must be fully convinced in his own mind.

The one who <st data-num="5426" class="">observes</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="5426" class="">does</st> it for the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>. The<n id="1" /> one who <st data-num="2068" class="">eats</st>, <st data-num="2068" class="">eats</st> for the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="2168" class="">gives thanks</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the one who <st data-num="3361">abstains</st> from <st data-num="2068" class="">eating</st> <st data-num="3361 2068">abstains</st> for the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="2168">gives thanks</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">none</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2198" class="">lives</st> for <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">none</st> <st data-num="599" class="">dies</st> for <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>.

<st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> we <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st>, we <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> for the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord;</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> we <st data-num="599" class="">die</st>, we <st data-num="599" class="">die</st> for the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>. <st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st>, <st data-num="1437" class="">whether</st> we <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">or</st> <st data-num="599" class="">die</st>, we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="2962">Lord’s</st>.
For this reason Christ died and returned to life, so that he may be the Lord of both the dead and the living.
But you who eat vegetables only—why do you judge your brother or sister? And you who eat everything—why do you despise your brother or sister? For we will all stand before the judgment seat of God.
For it is written, “As I live, says the Lord, every knee will bow to me, and every tongue will give praise to God.”
Therefore, each of us will give an account of himself to God.
Therefore we must not pass judgment on one another, but rather determine never to place an obstacle or a trap before a brother or sister.

I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> am <st data-num="3982" class="">convinced</st> <st data-num="1722">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> there is <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st> <st data-num="2839" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">itself;</st> <st data-num="1487 3361">still</st>, it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2839" class="">unclean</st> to the <st data-num="1565" class="">one</st> who <st data-num="3049" class="">considers</st> it <st data-num="2839" class="">unclean</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="80">brother or sister</st><n id="1" /> is <st data-num="3076" class="">distressed</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because of</st> <st data-num="1033" class="">what you eat</st>,<n id="2" /> you are <st data-num="3765" class="">no longer</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">walking</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>.<n id="3" /> Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="622" class="">destroy</st> by <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1033" class="">food</st> someone <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> let what <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> consider <st data-num="18" class="">good</st><n id="1" /> be <st data-num="987">spoken of as evil</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">does</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">consist of</st> <st data-num="1035" class="">food</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4213" class="">drink</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>, <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5479" class="">joy</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.
For the one who serves Christ in this way is pleasing to God and approved by people.
So then, let us pursue what makes for peace and for building up one another.

Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2647" class="">destroy</st> the <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1752">for the sake of</st> <st data-num="1033" class="">food</st>. For <st data-num="235">although</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st> are <st data-num="2513" class="">clean</st>,<n id="1" /> it is <st data-num="2556" class="">wrong</st> to cause <st data-num="444" class="">anyone</st> to <st data-num="4348" class="">stumble</st> by what you <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st>.

It is <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="2068">eat</st> <st data-num="2907" class="">meat</st> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> to do anything <st data-num="3739">that</st> causes <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> to <st data-num="4350" class="">stumble</st>.<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st>, <st data-num="2192">keep</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4572" class="">yourself</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>. <st data-num="3107" class="">Blessed</st> is the one who does <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> he <st data-num="1381" class="">approves</st>.
But the man who doubts is condemned if he eats, because he does not do so from faith, and whatever is not from faith is sin.
